snippet: A blown 10-game division lead and a tough four-game series in Baltimore have done little to dampen the spirits of Yankees players.
abstract: Bill Pennington On Baseball column holds that a blown 10-game division lead and a tough four-game series against division rival Baltimore Orioles have done little to dampen the spirits of New York Yankees players.
lead_paragraph: A blown 10-game division lead and a tough four-game series in Baltimore have done little to dampen the spirits of Yankees players.

headline.seo: A Study in Pinstripes: ‘Got to Embrace the Adversity’
headline.main: A Study in Pinstripes: ‘Embrace the Adversity’
headline.print_headline: A Study in Pinstripes: ‘Embrace the Adversity’
